response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication. We are offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is a chance to secure a piece that not only adds value to your collection but also stands as a testament to your discerning taste and ambition. Don't miss out on this exceptional opportunity. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 750000}
